TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableRow/HtmlTableCellControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects that are the cells of an control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control. Controls can be added at the end of a collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection.Add%2A> method or at a specified index location in the collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
Only controls of type <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection> collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed

Docs.param: The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.

Docs.exception: The added control must be of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void AddAt (int index, System.Web.UI.Control child);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void AddAt(int32 index, class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed

Docs.param: The location in the array at which to add the child control.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the collection at the specified index location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.

Docs.exception: The added control must be of type .
